mapper.select: SELECT empid as bid, name, comment, regdate, useyn FROM cod_employment
SELECT tid as bid, name, comment, regdate, useyn FROM cod_employment
SELECT frid as bid, name, comment, regdate, useyn FROM cod_freeboard
SELECT swid as bid, name, comment, regdate, useyn FROM cod_schoolwork

SELECT a.orgid, a.name as orgname, a.comment, a.regdate, a.moddate, a.prno, a.prname, a.vprno, a.vprname, b.name as orgtype, b.useyn FROM info_organization a LEFT JOIN cod_orgtype b on a.orgtypeid = b.orgtypeid
